title: NFT Platform
description:
NFT Marketplace Platform

A full-featured NFT platform where users can create, import, buy, sell, and auction NFTs with a smooth and secure experience.

‚ú® Key Features

  • Mint & Import NFTs: Users can create new NFTs or import existing ones from other wallets.
  • Marketplace: Explore listed NFTs, filter by categories, and buy/sell using a connected wallet.
  • Auctions: Support for timed bidding with automatic winner selection and smart contract handling.
  • Wallet Integration: Secure login and transactions using MetaMask or other wallets.
  • Admin Panel: Manage users, NFTs, reported items, and platform settings.
  • User Dashboard: Personalized profile with owned, listed, purchased, and favorite NFTs.
  • Smart Contracts: Built with Solidity and deployed on Ethereum-compatible networks.

üõ†Ô∏è Tech Stack

  • Frontend: React.js / Next.js, Tailwind CSS / styled-components
  • Backend: Node.js, Express, MongoDB
  • Blockchain: Solidity, Web3.js / Ethers.js
  • Wallets: MetaMask integration
  • Storage: IPFS / Pinata for decentralized media
  • Authentication: JWT or Web3 wallet-based login
